content:
I'd be happy to help you set reminders for dropping off Emily at school.

Since you mentioned you want to set reminders for dropping off Emily at school, I assume you want to set a daily reminder for weekdays (Monday to Friday). Here's how you can do it:

**Option 1: Google Calendar**

* Open Google Calendar on your device
* Click on the "+" icon to create a new event
* Enter "Drop off Emily at school" as the event title
* Set the start time to the time you need to drop off Emily at school (e.g., 8:00 am)
* Set the duration to a short period, like 15 minutes
* Select "Monday" to "Friday" as the recurring days
* Set a reminder for 30 minutes before the event (or at a time that works for you)
* Click "Save" to create the event

**Option 2: Apple Reminders (for iOS devices)**

* Open the Reminders app on your iPhone or iPad
* Tap the "+" icon to create a new reminder
* Enter "Drop off Emily at school" as the reminder title
* Set the reminder for the time you need to drop off Emily at school (e.g., 8:00 am)
* Tap "Repeat" and select "Every weekday" (or "Every Monday to Friday")
* Set a reminder time, such as 30 minutes before the event
* Tap "Add" to create the reminder

**Option 3: Any other calendar or reminder app**

* Follow similar steps to create a new event or reminder in your preferred app
* Set the title, start time, duration, and recurrence (Monday to Friday)
* Set a reminder time that works for you

Some tips to keep in mind:

* Make sure to set the reminder at a time that gives you enough time to get Emily ready and arrive at school on time.
* You can also set a reminder for picking up Emily from school, if needed.
* Consider setting reminders for other daily or weekly activities, such as meal prep, exercise, or work tasks, to help you stay organized and on track.

By setting reminders for dropping off Emily at school, you'll be able to stay on top of your daily routine and ensure that Emily gets to school safely and on time.
